thread.title: Treasury Prices Inch Lower as Stocks Rebound, Producer-Price Index Surprises

author: Akane Otani
title: Treasury Prices Inch Lower as Stocks Rebound, Producer-Price Index Surprises
text:
U.S. Treasury prices nudged lower Tuesday as signs of easing trade tensions and increasing inflationary pressures dulled investorsâ€™ demand for assets they consider havens.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasury note settled at 2.799%, compared with 2.786% Monday.
Yields, which rise as bond prices fall, have now advanced in five of...
